Props.Name: Class
Props.Description: The class applied to the outermost element of the component

Props.Name: HasMore
Props.Description: Whether there is more content or not

Props.Name: Parent
Props.Description: A reference to the element that has overflow style, usually the parent element

Props.Name: Style
Props.Description: The style applied to the outermost element of the component

Props.Name: Threshold
Props.Description: The threshold of the scroll bottoming distance that triggers the loading event, in pixels
